body:
I am attempting to build CP2K using the Intel 2020/2018 compilers, but Libint fails to build correctly. I have been able to successfully build Libint using gcc@9.3.0.

There are a few warnings in the error output included below; these can be removed by changing the optimization flags and do not affect the error occurring after line 5560.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install libint@2.6.0%intel@18.0.5+fortran tune=cp2k-lmax-4 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell
...
==> 6029: Installing libint
==> Fetching https://github.com/evaleev/libint/archive/v2.6.0.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Staging archive: /tmp/user/spack-stage/spack-stage-libint-2.6.0-sxoiyujczgjjleas6fc67qkddqxqem74/v2.6.0.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /tmp/user/spack-stage/spack-stage-libint-2.6.0-sxoiyujczgjjleas6fc67qkddqxqem74
==> No patches needed for libint
==> 6029: libint: Building libint [AutotoolsPackage]
==> 6029: libint: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> 6029: libint: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> 6029: libint: Executing phase: 'build'
==> 6029: libint: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4' 'install'

3 errors found in build log:
     5555    FC fortran_example.o
     5556    /bin/sh   ../libtool --quiet --mode=link --tag=CXX      /opt/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/icpc -O2 -xSSE4.2 -axAVX,CORE-AVX2 -ipo -O2 
             -xSSE4.2 -axAVX,CORE-AVX2 -ipo   -L../lib -lint2 -lm   -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib64 -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib -L/opt/rhe
             l7/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018_update4_cluster_edition/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin -L/opt/r
             hel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib64/../lib64 -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib64/../lib64/ -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib/../lib64 -L/opt/rhel7/gcc
             /6.5.0/lib/../lib64/ -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/6.5.0/ -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-
             gnu/6.5.0/../../../../lib64 -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/6.5.0/../../../../lib64/ -L/lib/../lib64 -L/lib/../l
             ib64/ -L/usr/lib/../lib64 -L/usr/lib/../lib64/ -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib64/ -L/opt/rhel7/gcc/6.5.0/lib/ -L/opt/rhel7/gcc
             /6.5.0/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/6.5.0/../../../ -L/lib64 -L/lib/ -L/usr/lib64 -L/usr/lib -lifport -lifcoremt -limf -lsvml -lm -lipgo 
             -lirc -lpthread -lirc_s -ldl -o fortran_example fortran_example.o libint_f.o
     5557    icpc: command line warning #10121: overriding '-march=haswell' with '-xSSE4.2'
     5558    ipo: warning #11003: no IR in object file fortran_example.o; was the source file compiled with -ipo
     5559    ipo: warning #11003: no IR in object file libint_f.o; was the source file compiled with -ipo
     5560    /lib/../lib64/crt1.o: In function `_start':
  >> 5561    (.text+0x20): undefined reference to `main'
  >> 5562    make[1]: *** [fortran_example] Error 1
     5563    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/user/spack-stage/spack-stage-libint-2.6.0-sxoiyujczgjjleas6fc67qkddqxqem74/spack-src/generated/fortr
             an'
  >> 5564    make: *** [fortran] Error 1

```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.15.0-49-b3bc538
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-haswell


### Additional information

* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4914382/spack-build-env.txt)
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4914383/spack-build-out.txt)


### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: libint with Intel compilers
